Oh many, many hugs to you! I'm far from being 'bland'. It goes 
against my =
nature... Thank you for your wonderful words of 
encouragement, because whe=
ther people are bland, or not bland we're 
all wonderful in our own little/=
 big ways.  People are fascinating 
creatures, that's why I write about the=
m and draw them too.

You made me smile... Thanks! :D

ect matter certianly does NOT reflect on the

iting teacher consoled me in a 
similiar situation with some advice;think o=
f it as ice cream. There 
are hundreds of different varieties of ice cream =

and only because its pretty bland. Bland=3DBoring.

bland, dear.
